What's to say? Creating a sequel to a classic is no simple task. But somehow, Valve did it. They improved Portal every conceiveable way.

If you liked Portal 1, you'll LOVE Portal 2.
génial

one of the greatest games ever
a great game but it can get very very hard
Ainda por ser um jogo "antigo" tem ótimas físicas e tem uma história mais que incrível;

Brilliant puzzle game that tops the original if every way. Story is massively improved, gameplay graphics and controls have also had so re working and are fantastic. 

Very well optimised pc port can run on my aging laptop and that means a lot. 

If it's ever in a steam sale I'd recommend you pick it up 8/10

un estupendo juego de puzzles, con una gran historia, acompañada con personajes carismaticos y que esperarse del motor grafico, tras años de uso todavia sigue rindiendo frutos como los demas juegos de valve, pero si algo tengo que destacar es el cooperativo y como no, la gran comunidad que hace que este juego no envejeza

I've beaten the game, gotten all the achievments, even bought a skin for my robots, and theres still so much to do now that there are community maps.

Singleplayer campain is fun story-wise, but the puzzles were too easy. The co-op storymode was way better, but the community maps are where the fun is really at.
Fuckin awesome game. Dont have it ? Buy it ! Its worth every penny ! :D
i liked the first one and i like the next one. it has a real good storyline, the puzzle"s are great and the characters are nice and original! :-)

I have this for PS3 and I really wish I held onto the Steam code that came with it because it'd be freakin awesome on PC.  The puzzles are better all around than the 1st game, the story is fantastic and hilarious, and the multiplayer is good fun for a while.  It's only downside is that by it's very nature as a puzzle game, the replay value is low without downloading custom content.
Satisfied me the whole way. Plus an awesome song at the end!

Der Multiplayer ist nicht nur von der Story her gut, sondern auch grade dadurch, dass die Community auch welche Level machen kann, wird das Spiel nie langweilig. Der Singleplayer macht auch Spaß, aber wenn man einmal mit einem Freund den Multiplayer gespielt hat, ist es doch ein wenig einsam.
i love this game

O game faz você pensar bastante com vários puzzles difíceis e com a narração da Glados que é de mais.E ainda tem os custom maps que dão infinitas horas de jogo.

Recomendadíssimo!!!!  10/10.

This is my favorite game ever created by Valve and one of the greatest sequels for any video game in history. There are four games of the seventh generation that I consider to be true masterpieces: Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, The Last of Us, Mass Effect 2 and Portal 2. This is a game that I predict will age extremely well 20 years from now. It's also got a huge mod community if you want to play on custom maps or even create your own. This game also features a fun and addicting multiplayer mode and the single player mode is also just as amazing. This is a must play for any gamer out there. 

FINAL RATING: 99 out of 100
This game practically gives you endless hours of fun due to its great story and thousands of community created test chambers. It's no wonder that this is one of the best games of all time.

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade, make life give take the lemons! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons. What am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager. Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons. Do you know who I am? Im the man whos going to burn your house down. Im going to get my engineers to make a combustible lemon to burn your house down!

10/10

I love the story line for this game. Had the most fun playing it.

Must have ! 

Couldn't stop playing.. Let's just finish one room, one more, one more, one more..  Next game I'm buying is Portal 1

Прошел Portal 2 - IQ + 200
분위기가 음산해서 못해먹겠음

"Ouai et hier jme suis cassé la tête 2 heures sur ton p****n djeu pourri là ! C nul ! Y a pas d'action c que dé p****n de puzzle compliqué !" Dit Bob l'ami de Pierre .

Tout d'abord Portal 2 est un jeu d'ENIGME et de REFLEXION . Mais contrairement a ce que pense Bob (ou vous) il n'est pas du tout ennuyeux ! Il demande certe de la reflexion mais le jeu est très bien pensé et parfois vous vous rendrez compte que c'est en faite une simple question de timing ou que la réponse était sous votre nez depuis le début .

Je vous garantie des heures d'amusement en solo (à condition d'aimer se casser là tête un petit peu !) et encore d'inombrables autres heure de jeu en coop (non-local) avec un ami ! Et aussi des heure de rigolade ! 

Voilà pour vous éclairer quelque notes :

Graphisme : 8/10 => certe pas décoiffant il sont bien fichus et puis pour un jeu de ce genre on n'en demande pas plus .
Bande son : 6/10 => Malheuresement aucune musique de fond . . . Mais la voie de "La Maitresse des science mortel" (je                                                           sait plus son nom) et ses commentaire sarcastique ainsi que son . . .Hum . . . h u m o u r . . . ;P est suffisante
Gameplay : 9/10 => Il est excellent contrairement a se que Bob dit pas besoin d'action ! Il faut juste aimer réfléchir un peut .


NOTE : Je vous conseil néanmoins pour plus de fun de jouer avec un ami . Et qui sait peut être que vous aurez une fête ^^ . (allusion à la fin du mode coop)

Excelente jogo, com uma ótima jogabilidade e personagens muito interessantes.
Explora o estilo puzzle game combinando história e diversão como nenhum outro.
O modo multiplayer é muito interessante também gerando novos desafios para os jogadores.

I love Portal, and portal 2 made me love the series even more, I loved the challenge Portal 2 gave me, and the interactions with Wheatly and Glad0s, they made the game so much better with their comedy.

Pros
- Provides a challenge for anyone who loves challenges as much as i do
- Funny interactions between Wheatly, you and GLaD0s
- The sequel to Portal 
- can play offline
- very well thought up story

- GLaDOS: Well, this is the part where he kills us" 
   Wheatley "Hello! This is the part where I kill you"
   CHAPTER 9: THE PART WHERE HE KILLS YOU
   Achievement unlocked: The part where he kills you
   Soundtrack: The part where he kills you﻿



Cons
- sometimes the rooms can be a BIT to hard, makeing you (or me) rage quit or google how to beat a room.
- graphics are a little outdated but it doesn't take away from the fun or the story
there is no Portal 3.......yet

Great game with awsome story and cheeky dialoge along with a great gameing experience sure to frustrate you.

If I hadn't have played Kingdom Hearts since being seven, this would've easily been the best game I've played.
To put that into context for those who don't know what that means: this game is so clever, quirky, well-designed and satisfying to play that you'll have completed the story before you know it and will be urging a friend to get the game so you can play together. At no point have I complained about the game's design or things I wish were better, because the only improvement I could make to my gameplay is to actually utilize my brain while playing a video game. It's a big ask, I know, but it leaves you feeling smarter for being able to solve a puzzle without the game screaming "Hey! Listen!" at you. The dialogue is funny, the characters are realistic in their unique personalities, and the plot twists will leave you picking up all of the pieces of your mind that just exploded. It's mindblowing stuff.
2/5, Glendo's Ratings. Awesome game; would play again, or rather am playing again. And again. And again.
Buy this Game

This amazing sequel expands the first's story immensely and throws more and harder puzzles at you. You get to learn more than you ever knew about Aperture Science while still ending up with unanswered questions. And robots with attitude. I can only hope that the next installment, if there will ever be one, will live up to its predecessors.

In short: more puzzles, more story, more fun.

Portal 2 to bardzo fajna gra co opowa jak i na solo jest wiele łamigówek 10/0

The second game is very much like the first, only slightly longer. The writing is still very good, the puzzles still very boring. There is ever only one way to advance, and this is usually quite simple to figure out. Even in the supposed exploration portion of the game, there is always exactly one direction to go, with neat white walls marking the points where you can place a portal. Only in a couple of spots in the game I actually had to try several things before I found the right approach; More often than not, working one's way through the puzzles just felt like a chore. The dialogue (or monologue, as the protagonist is in a true Valve fashion completely mute) is very well-written, however -- more than enough so to make the work worthwhile.

喜歡解迷遊戲的玩家一定不要錯過這款好遊戲，
想和朋友一同玩樂的，別忘了這次還有雙人合作模式。
